Dialogue.Page: Arkose noticed a patch of ghost matter disappearing from time to time.
They spent their last moments tirelessly trying to figure out why.
The answer was the moon. As the Attlerock orbited over the patch of ghost matter, its gravity would pull on the substance, causing it to rise up.
Gabbro noticed ghost matter disappearing on Giant's Deep as well.
This turned out to be a second property of ghost matter, caused by water on Giant's Deep submerging and temporarily neutralizing ghost matter.
We wonder if the jellyfish on Giant's Deep ever found peace.
